ca.ahmedaly.config

Class RootContextConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ahmedaly.config.RootContextConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.AsyncConfigurer, org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.SchedulingConfigurer

    @Configuration
 @EnableScheduling
 @EnableLoadTimeWeaving
 @EnableAsync(mode=PROXY,
             proxyTargetClass=false,
             order=1)
 @EnableTransactionManagement(mode=PROXY,
                             proxyTargetClass=false,
                             order=2)
 @EnableJpaRepositories(basePackages="ca.ahmedaly.site.repositories",
                       entityManagerFactoryRef="entityManagerFactoryBean",
                       transactionManagerRef="jpaTransactionManager")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="ca.ahmedaly.site",
               excludeFilters=)
 @Import(value={SecurityConfiguration.class,SocialConfiguration.class})
public class RootContextConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.AsyncConfigurer, org.springframework.scheduling.annotation.SchedulingConfigurer
